description: Hundreds are stranded at the nations' border as Ukraine's Covid rules block entry to foreigners.
title: Coronavirus: Ukraine accuses Belarus over stranded Jewish pilgrims
title_page: Coronavirus: Ukraine accuses Belarus over stranded Jewish pilgrims - BBC News
maintext: The office of Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelensky said: "We call on the Belarusian authorities to stop creating additional tension on the border with our country and not make false encouraging announcements for pilgrims, which could give them the impression that Ukraine's border could still be open to foreigners."
